title: About the KOKORO Translation
author: VD
content_html:
Over at Castalia Library is an interesting comparison of the three primary English translations as reviewed by three different AIs, as well as a poll on the desirability of doing a leather edition of Kokoro. If it’s of interest, share your thoughts with us, as there are a few different options.

DISCUSS ON SG
